message.content: {"given_definition_quality":76,"better_definition":"cooked rice or a meal","sentence":"桌子上有饭。","image_prompt":"A simple dinner scene in a quiet, softly-lit dining room after an apocalypse; on a table sits a bowl of fluffy white rice. The style is soft apocalypse animation, gentle colors, with some light coming through a cracked window, but the rice and table are clean and untouched. The focus is on the bowl of rice on the table.","sentence_translation":"There is rice on the table."}
